headline: Wolfe Research Lowers Analog Devices (ADI) Price Target, Keeps Outperform Rating
summary: Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) is one of the 10 Best American Semiconductor Stocks to Buy Now. On May 22, Wolfe Research reduced its price target for Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) from $295 to $280 but kept an “Outperform” rating. The firm’s analyst, Chris Caso, explained that the reduced price target is based on a valuation […]

headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Semtech and Analog Devices
summary: Semtech and Analog Devices show promise in a cautious chip market, fueled by AI, auto tech, and long-cycle industrial demand.
